name: Deep In The Woods (theraveparade, Void watcher(0), Leshiy)
name_original: Deep In The Woods (theraveparade, Void watcher(0), Leshiy)
description: Why did you come here at such a late hour, kid? The night in the forest is as dark as a nightmare. After sunset, the thicket is filled with phantom voices and wandering spirits. Well, I see that you’re scared now. That’s right, you will face many eerie visions along the way. But you still want to go there, don’t you? Then remember the most important thing: fear has many faces, but the only one of them is true.
